Niciodata nu trimiteti niciodata valutele sau portofelele la nici o platforma de tranzactionare centralizata din nou. Tati-le acasa.
Bucurati-va de un adevarat instrument de tranzactionare avansat demn de cele mai bune instrumente de pe piata de capital.

solution-area.head: Problems &
solution-area.desc1: The problems with centralized platforms are well known by the crypto-currency trading community.
solution-area.desc2: We provide simple and innovative solutions.
solution-area.problems.p1: The press regularly reports acts of piracy on centralized exchange platforms, to the tune of millions of dollars. The victims are above all the users themselves, since it is the exchanger that holds the private keys of the traders' wallets. Lack of confidence in the security of centralized platforms prompts users to remove their cryptocurrencies from these platforms:
solution-area.problems.p1.li1: which results in transaction costs and additional delays.
solution-area.problems.p1.li2: which prevents the use of classic orders such as stop-loss, trigger range orders, OCO orders (order cancels order), thus becoming useless.
solution-area.problems.p2: Current platforms suffer from a lack of ergonomics compared to stock market trading tools. Some are puzzles to use, even for a trader at ease with the computer tool.
solution-area.problems.p3: Finally, existing trading platforms have load problems, even interrupting their services during periods of heavy activity, a critical time when users need them most (market panic).
solution-area.solutions.p1: $1 is a cryptocurrency exchange ecosystem, built around a decentralized service (P2P), a client application for trading, and optional micro services to take advantage of the new options offered by this new network.
solution-area.solutions.p2: $1 provides both the advantages of centralized and decentralized exchanges:
solution-area.solutions.p2.li3: no intermediaries holding the users' crypto-currencies
solution-area.solutions.p2.li4: ergonomics inspired by the best stock trading software
solution-area.solutions.p3: The security and atomicity of the exchanges are ensured by a DApp ETH application dedicated to this task. It will be carried on other blockchains supporting smart contracts such as EOS, in order to ensure interoperability and atomicity of exchanges on the latter, and to increase the number of transactions per second feasible, by aggregating the execution capabilities of each blockchain.

whitepaper-area.read.p1: Learn more about the vision of $1 and fully understand why the decentralization of exchanges platforms is the future of digital currencies trading.
tokensale-area.head: Tokens Sale
tokensale-area.desc1: Beyond speculation on SSW tokens, token owners, who will have launched one or more nodes,
tokensale-area.desc2: are rewarded by earning a portion of the margin generated by the transactions.
tokensale-area.info.ended: HardCap reached. Thanks a lot, Bye !!!
tokensale-area.info.desc: We will post our Wallet address one minute before the pre-sale begins. It will be posted on all our websites, Bitcointalk, Twitter and Facebook. Please check at least 2-3 of these sites to make sure the address is exactly the same, before sending your Ethers to this address.
tokensale-area.note1: Please note that we will not personally send you our address by Telegram or any other platform, so be careful and beware of any scam!
tokensale-area.note2: Note that our Wallet address will only be published one minute before the start of the presale, so any other platform claiming to represent $1 are scam attempts! If you discover such an attempt, please report it to us so that we can remedy it immediately,
app-area.head: Multi-platform App
app-area.desc1: Never transfer your digital currency to any trading platform again.
app-area.desc2: Trade your currency directly from your wallet, no middleman.
app-area.title: An anti-theft system
app-area.p1: $1 offers a client application dedicated to crypto-currencies trading. This system is really decentralized, traders remain in possession of their crypto-currencies until the moment the sell order finds a counterpart. Only the $1 client application knows the user's private wallet keys. Digital signature of contracts for blockchains is done directly on the customer's application (offline signature). With a hardware wallet (ledger, Trezor...), private keys are never even stored on your computer.
app-area.p2: In addition, $1 offers ease of use and ergonomics comparable to the best existing trading software (stock markets, future contracts, forex...). In particular, $1 supports advanced orders, such as trigger range orders, multiple range conditional orders, OCO orders..., as well as trading on charts with conditional orders on crossing horizontal lines or slopes, on indicators, etc...
app-area.p3: The trading application is multi-platform. It runs on all most common systems, desktops or mobile.
roadmap-area.head: Roadmap
roadmap-area.desc1: Roadmap of the project in case the ICO hard cap is reached. Otherwise, the project is designed as drawer modules. The development of each module can be postponed until the generated revenues allow the self financing of the realization of these functionalities.
roadmap-area.desc2: Roadmap features that may be delayed are marked with an asterisk (*). Improvements to the exchange, addition of crypto currencies (gateway nodes) etc. will continue to be made beyond this roadmap.
roadmap-area.jalon1.desc:
- Emergence & design of the idea.
- Market research.
- Creation of the draft platform design
roadmap-area.jalon2.desc:
- Launch of the project
- Start of the technical design and definitions of the ICO;
- Technical preparation of the ICO.
roadmap-area.jalon3.desc:
- Creation of the company : Grey Matter Technologies.
- Technical preparation of the ICO.
- Start of services and customer application.
roadmap-area.jalon6.desc:
- End of ICO
- Start of hiring for team reinforcement (*)
roadmap-area.jalon7.desc:
- Alpha version of the client and the gateway node.
- Bug Bounty Campaign
roadmap-area.jalon8.desc:
- Alpha version of the arbitration node and the skeleton node for fiat conversion (*).
- Bug Bounty Campaign
roadmap-area.jalon9.desc:
- Beta version of all platform components
- Bug Bounty campaign
roadmap-area.jalon10.desc:
- RC version of the client with gateway nodes.
- Launch of the first gateway nodes.
- RC version of the arbitration node.
- First Bug Bounty campaign, on retail version.
roadmap-area.jalon11.desc:
- Introduction of new Crypto currencies.
- Addition of external exchangers to the arbitration system(*).
- Version beta mobile client application (Android, IOS) (*).
- Studies and preliminary steps for the operation of a node conversion to fiat currencies: Chilean Peso.
- Creation of a dedicated legal structure (*)
roadmap-area.jalon12.desc:
- End of the first campaign of the Bug Bounty program, awards and corrections made.
- Introduction of new Crypto currencies.
roadmap-area.jalon13.desc:
- End of the second campaign of the program Bug Bounty
- Introduction of new Crypto currencies.
- Version operation of client applications on mobile (Android, IOS) (*)
- Studies and preliminary steps for the operation of a node conversion to fiat currencies: Peruvian Sol. Creation of a dedicated legal structure (*)
roadmap-area.jalon14.desc:
- End of the third campaign of the program Bug Bounty
- Introduction of new Crypto currencies.
roadmap-area.jalon15.desc:
- End of the fourth campaign of the Bug Bounty program.
- Introduction of new Crypto currencies.
- Studies and preliminary steps for the operation of a node of conversion to fiat currencies: Argentine Peso.
- Creation of a dedicated legal structure (*)
roadmap-area.jalon16.desc: And so on, added support for crypto currencies and fiat currencies on a three-month development cycle basis, or faster if possible.
